summary:
Shamanism is a spiritual practice where a shaman connects with the spirit world to help people. They enter a trance to communicate with spirits and use this power for healing, predicting the future, or helping their community.

This ancient practice has been studied by many experts and has influenced modern spiritual movements, like the hippies and New Age. These new movements, called neoshamanism, combine ideas from different cultures, especially Native American traditions.
title: Shamanism
